bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: ND4S: There is a bug in `CollectionLikeNDArray.existsRC`
bug.description: From @letalvoj on November 14, 2017 12:55 Check out <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/nd4s/blob/bf2ea7d5f829f0d3a61c11a0d8ba11ccc6e220dd/src/main/scala/org/nd4s/CollectionLikeNDArray.scala#L77>CollectionLikeNDArray.scala#L77</denchmark-link> . The condition is negated . I am updating the code in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/nd4s/issues/108>#108</denchmark-link> anyway. Thus I'll write breaking tests and fix it there. Copied from original issue: deeplearning4j/nd4s#120

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/raver119>@raver119</denchmark-link> There's no such method anymore. Looks like can be closed.
